1703384842895428632.Text: Well, not even angry, I suppose. I saw him arguing once with Foryn Gilnith about his taxes. He thought Processus had been levying too much, and skimming off the top for himself. Ridiculous! Processus wouldn't have done such a thing, I'm sure of it. Please find out what happened, friend. And if you find out what became of Processus' ring, it would ease my heart.
